title: CSE 3421 - Introduction to Computer Architecture
description: Organization of hardware and software in modern computer systems, including instruction set design, processor control, ALU design, pipelining, multicores and accelerators, and memory subsystem design.Prereq: 2231 or 321, and 2421, 2560, 265, or 360, and 2000 or 261. Not open to students with credit for 5421 (675.01) or 675.02.
